#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int abs(int n) {
	if (n > 0) {
		return n;
	} 
	return (-1) * n;
}

int main ()
{
	int n, k;
	cin >> n;
	
	for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {
		cin >> k;
		int a[k], b[k];
		long long int sum = 0;
		
		for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
			cin >> a[i];
		}
		
		for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
			cin >> b[i];
		}
		sort(a, a + k);
		sort(b, b + k);
		
		for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
			sum += abs(a[i] - b[i]);
		}
	
		cout << "Case "<< j << ": " << sum << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
